snippet: A Berlin court has ordered Germany to pay the heirs of Jewish owners of a department store chain about $68 million in additional compensation for property seized by the Nazis.
abstract: Berlin court orders Germany to pay Schocken family, heirs of Jewish owners of department store chain, $68 million in additional compensation for property seized by Nazis.
lead_paragraph: A Berlin court has ordered Germany to pay the heirs of Jewish owners of a department store chain about $68 million in additional compensation for property seized by the Nazis.

headline.main: Germany: Compensation for Nazi Seizures Increased
headline.print_headline: Germany: Compensation for Nazi Seizures Increased
